Description: Register 1953: Pottery figure of a dog, red, with two holes in back, on a rectangular base with closely scored underside; strigil or rasp
Curator's comments: Register 1953: "Strigil" Modern. EGYPT. [ie used as a scraper]
Acquisition name: Bequeathed through: Mrs B E Tugwell
Acquisition notes: Af1953,18.1 to 4 were given by the executors of E H Tugwell (through his widow Mrs B E Tugwell).
